Metadata: The Columbia River: Its Future and You (Teacher's Manual for Grades 5-8)
Oregon State University (OSU Sea Grant College Program

This booklet is part of a project to develop a multidisciplinaâ€‹ry set of curricula and educational materials on the Columbia River system in Oregon. This curriculum for grades 5-8, as you will see, involves reading in content, writing, math, decision making, problem solving, and invention; it appeals to logical and inventive thinking as well as inventive, creative thinking. Topics include: History, Power, Navigation, Agriculture and irrigation, Fisheries, and Recreation.
